9477.en: <voice 00250_00009477><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>...Ho-ho. Well, well, well...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9477.ja:
<voice 00250_00009477><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……ほっほう。
　これは　これは……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9477.ko:
<voice 00250_00009477><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……호호오.
　이거, 이거…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9477.zh-Hans:
<voice 00250_00009477><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……哎哟哟。
这不是那个谁么……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9477.zh-Hant:
<voice 00250_00009477><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……呵呵呵，
這不就是那個誰嘛……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9478.en:
<voice 00300_00009478><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ya' haven't forgotten about yer ol' pal Hollow, have ya?
There's nothin' in Astoltia I don't know!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9478.ja:
<voice 00300_00009478><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「またまた　会ったのう　<pc>。
　アストルティアに　知らぬことなし！
　ご存知　放浪の賢者　ホーローじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9478.ko:
<voice 00300_00009478><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 또 만났군, <pc>.
　아스톨티아에 대해 모르는 것이 없는!
　알다시피 떠돌이 현자 호로일세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9478.zh-Hans:
<voice 00300_00009478><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我们怎么那么有缘呢，<pc>。
我就是雅斯特露琪亚的活百科，
流浪的贤者霍洛！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9478.zh-Hant:
<voice 00300_00009478><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>，我們又見面了。
我是對雅斯特露琪亞無所不知的
流浪賢者霍洛。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001117.en: <voice 00505_19001117><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>...Well. I can tell just by lookin' at ya.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001117.ja: <voice 00505_19001117><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。ひと目見て　ピンと来たぞい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001117.ko: <voice 00505_19001117><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……흐음. 딱 보니 알겠구먼.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001117.zh-Hans: <voice 00505_19001117><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……嗯，我一看你的表情就知道。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001117.zh-Hant: <voice 00505_19001117><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……嗯，我一看你的表情就知道。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001118.en:
<voice 00506_19001118><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I can see that you've managed to collect the key
emblems for Orphea, Julette, Azlan, Gatara and Glen.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001118.ja:
<voice 00506_19001118><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おぬし　ついに　オルフェア　ジュレット
　グレン　アズラン　ガタラの
　キーエンブレムを　集めたようじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001118.ko:
<voice 00506_19001118><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자네, 드디어 오르페어, 주레트,
　그렌, 아즐란, 가타라의
　키 엠블럼을 모두 모은 게로군.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001118.zh-Hans:
<voice 00506_19001118><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>看来你已经收齐了
欧鲁非亚、玖莱特、古莲、
安须岚和加塔拉的键徽了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001118.zh-Hant:
<voice 00506_19001118><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>看來你已經收齊了
歐菲亞、玖萊特、古蓮、
安須嵐和加塔拉的鑰徽了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9480.en:
<voice 00620_00009480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I was wrong before.
I can feel yer great and marvellous strength now!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9480.ja:
<voice 00620_00009480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「いやはや　見ちがえたの～。
　グレートかつ　マーベラスな
　おぬしの強さ　ビンビン感じるぞい。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9480.ko:
<voice 00620_00009480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 어이쿠, 이거 몰라보겠네~
　그레이트하고 마블러스한
　자네의 실력이 팍팍 느껴지는구먼.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9480.zh-Hans:
<voice 00620_00009480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>哎呀哎呀，我对你刮目相看了。
你现在的实力无与伦比，
和之前简直判若两人。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9480.zh-Hant:
<voice 00620_00009480><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>哎呀哎呀，我對你刮目相看了。
你現在的實力無與倫比，
和之前簡直判若兩人。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9481.en: <voice 00780_00009481><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Aye, the time has come.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9481.ja: <voice 00780_00009481><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「時は来たれり……ということか。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9481.ko: <voice 00780_00009481><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 때가 왔다……는 겐가.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9481.zh-Hans: <voice 00780_00009481><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>时机……已经成熟了么。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9481.zh-Hant: <voice 00780_00009481><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>時機……已經成熟了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9482.en:
<voice 00911_00009482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>As I promised, now is the time fer me
ta' show ya' the way to liberate Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9482.ja:
<voice 00911_00009482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「では　かねてからの約束通り　今こそ
　レンダーシア解放への道を　教えちゃおうぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9482.ko:
<voice 00911_00009482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그럼 예전부터 약속한 대로 이번에는
　렌더시아를 해방하는 길을 가르쳐 주지!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9482.zh-Hans:
<voice 00911_00009482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那好，我就遵守诺言，
告诉你拯救冷达西亚的方法！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9482.zh-Hant:
<voice 00911_00009482><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那好，我就遵守諾言，
告訴你拯救冷達西亞的方法！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9483.en:
<voice 00946_00009483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ta' free Lendersia from the seal, ya' gotta
defeat the one who cast it... the Netherlord, Nergel.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9483.ja:
<voice 00946_00009483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「レンダーシアを　封印から解放するには
　それをなした者……冥王ネルゲルを
　倒さねばならんのが　道理じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9483.ko:
<voice 00946_00009483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 렌더시아를 봉인에서 해방하려면
　그 일을 행한 자…… 명왕 네르겔을
　쓰러뜨려야만 한다네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9483.zh-Hans:
<voice 00946_00009483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>要将冷达西亚从封印中解放出来，
自然就要先除掉
这一切的始作俑者——冥王内尔格尔。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9483.zh-Hant:
<voice 00946_00009483><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>要把冷達西亞從封印中解放出來，
自然就要先除掉
這一切的始作俑者……冥王內爾格爾。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9484.en:
<voice 00996_00009484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>But the entrance to the underworld, ruled by
Nergel, lies at the end of a cliff deep in the
Landon Mountains, and no one can reach it.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9484.ja:
<voice 00996_00009484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「だが　ネルゲルの支配する　冥界への入り口は 
　ランドン山脈の奥深く　断崖の先にあり　
　誰も　そこへ至ることは　かなわぬ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9484.ko:
<voice 00996_00009484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 하지만 네르겔이 지배하는 명계의 입구는
　랭든산맥 깊숙한 곳의 절벽 끝에 있어
　아무도 그곳에는 도달할 수 없다고 하지.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9484.zh-Hans:
<voice 00996_00009484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>但是，通往内尔格尔统治的冥界的入口，
在兰顿山脉最深处的悬崖对面，
没有人能到达那里。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9484.zh-Hant:
<voice 00996_00009484><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>另外，通往內爾格爾統治的冥界入口，
就在蘭頓山脈最深處的懸崖對面，
據說沒有人能到達那裡。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9485.en:
<voice 01106_00009485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>But don't fret! There's always a way, so
leave things in the hand of me, Wandering
Sage Hollow!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9485.ja:
<voice 01106_00009485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……しかし　方法がないわけではない。
　この放浪の賢者ホーローに
　まかせておけば　バッチリじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9485.ko:
<voice 01106_00009485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……하지만 방법이 아예 없지는 않다네.
　이 떠돌이 현자 호로에게
　맡기면 뚝딱이지!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9485.zh-Hans:
<voice 01106_00009485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……不过，这不意味着无计可施了。
有流浪的贤者霍洛在，
没有解决不了的事。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9485.zh-Hant:
<voice 01106_00009485><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……不過，這並不代表無計可施。
有我流浪賢者霍洛在，
沒有解決不了的事！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9486.en:
<voice 01206_00009486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>First, let's head to the cliffs so we can see
the entrance to the Underworld in the Landon
Mountains above Ogreed.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9486.ja:
<voice 01206_00009486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「まずは　オーグリード大陸にそびえる
　ランドン山脈の　冥界への入り口が見える
　断崖まで　行ってみることにしようぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9486.ko:
<voice 01206_00009486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 우선 오그리드 대륙에 우뚝 솟은
　랭든산맥의 명계의 입구가 보이는
　절벽까지 가 보도록 하세.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9486.zh-Hans:
<voice 01206_00009486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>首先，前往能望见冥界入口的悬崖吧。
那个悬崖就位于
奥古力德大陆的兰顿山脉一带。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9486.zh-Hant:
<voice 01206_00009486><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>首先，前往能看到冥界入口的懸崖吧。
那個懸崖就位在奧古利德大陸的
蘭頓山脈一帶。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9487.en:
<voice 01341_00033001><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>Next stop is Orphea.
Recently, there have been a number of
accidents with travelers infected with miasma.<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9487.ja:
<voice 01341_00033001><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>「次は～　オルフェア～　オルフェア～。
　最近　野外を旅する方が　魔瘴の被害に
　遭うという事故が　多発しております。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9487.ko:
<voice 01341_00033001><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>: 다음 역은~ 오르페어~ 오르페어~
　최근 들어 여행자가 야외에서 마장 피해를
　입는 사고가 빈번하게 발생하고 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9487.zh-Hans:
<voice 01341_00033001><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>前方到站是欧鲁非亚，欧鲁非亚。
最近有许多在野外旅行的人
都遇到意外，受到魔瘴的伤害。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9487.zh-Hant:
<voice 01341_00033001><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>下一站～～歐菲亞～～歐菲亞～～
最近有許多在野外旅行的人
都遇到意外，受到魔瘴的傷害。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

33008.en:
<voice 01391_00033008><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>Please be careful as you exit the train.
Enjoy a safe trip and remember to stay out
of the way of evil.<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33008.ja:
<voice 01391_00033008><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>「お出かけの際は　くれぐれもお気をつけて。
　魔瘴には　よらず　さわらず　踏み込まずを
　心がけ　安全な旅を　お楽しみください。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33008.ko:
<voice 01391_00033008><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>: 야외에 나갈 때는 모쪼록 조심하시기 바랍니다.
　마장 접근 금지, 접촉 금지, 진입 금지를
　유념해 안전한 여행을 즐기시기 바랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33008.zh-Hans:
<voice 01391_00033008><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>外出时请千万要小心。
请注意不要靠近魔瘴、接触魔瘴、
深入魔瘴区域，愿大家旅程愉快。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33008.zh-Hant:
<voice 01391_00033008><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>外出時請千萬要小心。
請注意不要靠近魔瘴、接觸魔瘴、
深入魔瘴區域，以便享受安全的旅程。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9489.en:
<voice 01466_00009489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>You heard it, didn't you? The recent increase
in miasma cases is the result of the sealing
of Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9489.ja:
<voice 01466_00009489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……聞いたじゃろう？
　近ごろ　魔瘴の被害が　増えているのは
　レンダーシア封印の影響に　他ならぬ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9489.ko:
<voice 01466_00009489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……들었나?
　요즘에 마장 피해가 늘어난 것은
　렌더시아가 봉인된 그 영향이 틀림없네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9489.zh-Hans:
<voice 01466_00009489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……听到了吧？
最近，魔瘴造成的危害正在扩大，
这正是因为受到了冷达西亚的封印影响。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9489.zh-Hant:
<voice 01466_00009489><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……聽到了吧？
最近，魔瘴造成的危害正在擴大，
這正是受到冷達西亞的封印影響所致。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9490.en:
<voice 01506_00009490><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>If Nergel is left unchecked, Astoltia will
eventually be covered in miasma and destroyed.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9490.ja:
<voice 01506_00009490><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「このまま　ネルゲルめを放置すれば
　やがて　アストルティアは
　魔瘴におおわれ　滅ぼされるじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9490.ko:
<voice 01506_00009490><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 이대로 네르겔 놈을 내버려두면
　머지않아 아스톨티아는
　마장에 뒤덮여 멸망하겠지.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9490.zh-Hans:
<voice 01506_00009490><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>任内尔格尔这样胡闹下去，
雅斯特露琪亚早晚会被魔瘴吞噬掉的。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9490.zh-Hant:
<voice 01506_00009490><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>任由內爾格爾這樣胡鬧下去，
雅斯特露琪亞
遲早會被魔瘴吞噬的。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9491.en: <voice 01556_00009491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>That must be prevented!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9491.ja: <voice 01556_00009491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「それだけは　防がねばならん！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9491.ko: <voice 01556_00009491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그것만은 막아야 하네!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9491.zh-Hans: <voice 01556_00009491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>必须要阻止这件事！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9491.zh-Hant: <voice 01556_00009491><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>必須要阻止這件事才行！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9492.en:
<voice 01596_00009492><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I've been traveling the world, waiting for
someone like you to show up.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9492.ja:
<voice 01596_00009492><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「わしは　こうして　世界をめぐり
　おぬしのような若者が　育つのを
　ずっと　待っておった。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9492.ko:
<voice 01596_00009492><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 나는 이렇게 세계를 떠돌며
　자네 같은 젊은이가 자라나기를
　줄곧 기다렸다네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9492.zh-Hans:
<voice 01596_00009492><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我周游世界，
一直期待能够培养
像你这样的年轻人。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9492.zh-Hant:
<voice 01596_00009492><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我周遊世界，
就是希望能一直培養
像你這樣的年輕人。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9493.en:
<voice 01645_00009493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>. You are my hope.
Please fulfill this mission!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9493.ja:
<voice 01645_00009493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。
　おぬしは　わしの希望じゃ。
　どうか　この使命　果たしてくれよ！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9493.ko:
<voice 01645_00009493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: <pc>.
　자네는 나의 희망일세.
　부디 이 사명을 완수해 주게나!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9493.zh-Hans:
<voice 01645_00009493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>啊，你是我的希望。
一定要达成使命啊！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9493.zh-Hant:
<voice 01645_00009493><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
你是我的希望。
你一定要達成使命啊！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9494.en:
<voice 01786_00009494><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>No! I missed my lunch when making that
passionate speech!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9494.ja:
<voice 01786_00009494><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……ううっ！　熱弁をふるっていたら
　駅弁を食いそびれてしまった！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9494.ko:
<voice 01786_00009494><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……어이쿠! 열변을 토하다가
　도시락 먹는 걸 깜빡했구먼!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9494.zh-Hans:
<voice 01786_00009494><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……哦，光顾着说话，
都忘记吃车站便当了！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9494.zh-Hant:
<voice 01786_00009494><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……嗚嗚！光顧著說話，
都忘記吃車站便當了！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9495.en:
<voice 01966_00033012><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I gotta get that famous Acrobatic Cake
at the Orphea station! Sorry, but I gotta go!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9495.ja:
<voice 01966_00033012><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「じゃが　オルフェア駅では
　名物　アクロバットケーキを買わねばっ！
　悪いが　ここで　失礼させてもらうぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9495.ko:
<voice 01966_00033012><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 하지만 오르페어역에서는
　명물 아크로배트 케이크를 사야 해!
　미안하지만 난 이만 실례하겠네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9495.zh-Hans:
<voice 01966_00033012><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>但必须在欧鲁非亚站
购买特产杂技蛋糕！
抱歉，我在这先告辞了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9495.zh-Hant:
<voice 01966_00033012><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>但必須在歐菲亞車站
購買名產雜技蛋糕！
抱歉，我在這先告辭了。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

33019.en:
<voice 02251_00033019><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Let me say it again. Head for the Landon
Mountains that rise above the continent of Ogreed.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33019.ja:
<voice 02251_00033019><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「もう一度　言っとくぞい。
　オーグリード大陸にそびえる
　ランドン山脈に　向かうのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33019.ko:
<voice 02251_00033019><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 다시 한번 말하지만
　오그리드 대륙에 자리한
　랭든산맥으로 가야 하네.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33019.zh-Hans:
<voice 02251_00033019><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我再说一次。
要前往耸立在奥古力德大陆的
兰顿山脉。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33019.zh-Hant:
<voice 02251_00033019><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>我再說一次。
要前往聳立在奧古利德大陸
的蘭頓山脈。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9497.en:
<voice 02286_00009497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Go to the cliff where you can see the entrance
to the underworld. I will follow you soon.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9497.ja:
<voice 02286_00009497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「そして　その奥深くにある　
　冥界への入り口が見える　断崖まで行ってくれ。
　わしも　すぐに　後を追うからの。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9497.ko:
<voice 02286_00009497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그리고 그 깊숙한 곳에 있는
　명계의 입구가 보이는 절벽까지 가게.
　나도 금방 따라갈 테니.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9497.zh-Hans:
<voice 02286_00009497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>然后，前往山脉深处
能够看见冥界入口的悬崖。
我也会抓紧时间赶过去的。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9497.zh-Hant:
<voice 02286_00009497><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>然後，前往山脈深處
就能看見冥界入口的懸崖。
我隨後也會趕過去的。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9498.en:
<voice 02326_00009498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Well, I bid ya' adieu fer' today

See ya' again when the tracks of destiny cross!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9498.ja:
<voice 02326_00009498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「では　今日のところは　お別れじゃ。
　運命の線路が交差するとき　また会おう！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9498.ko:
<voice 02326_00009498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그럼 오늘은 이만 헤어지세.
　운명의 선로가 교차할 때 다시 만나세!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9498.zh-Hans:
<voice 02326_00009498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那么今天就在此作别吧。
待命运之轨再度交汇时再见吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9498.zh-Hant:
<voice 02326_00009498><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那今天就先告辭了，
待命運之軌交會時再見吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
